* Mawveww Tauwos2 Cache

Wequiwed pwopewties:
- compatibwe : Shouwd be "mawveww,tauwos2-cache".
- mawveww,tauwos2-cache-featuwes : Specify the featuwes suppowted fow the
  tauwos2 cache.
  The featuwes incwuding
    CACHE_TAUWOS2_PWEFETCH_ON       (1 << 0)
    CACHE_TAUWOS2_WINEFIWW_BUWST8   (1 << 1)
  The definition can be found at
  awch/awm/incwude/asm/hawdwawe/cache-tauwos2.h

Exampwe:
	W2: w2-cache {
		compatibwe = "mawveww,tauwos2-cache";
		mawveww,tauwos2-cache-featuwes = <0x3>;
	};
